name: Tap Chips Neon
description:
TAP CHIPS NEON is a new free fantastic merge up game, brand new graphic - neon, enjoy the luxurious experience and get hours of fun. Are you ready!
Just tap to increase casino chips rank to merge 3 or more chips with the same rank together, try to achieve the best score in each run!
It's time to play a wonderful superb merge up game.


KEY FEATURES:
- EASY TO PLAY: Match at least 3 chips with the same rank to combine them into one with higher rank
- COMBO CHAIN: Make as many combo as possible to multiply score
- SMASH & BLAST: You have a chance on merge up a new chip to create a magic orb that can blast another one
- RAINBOW CHIP: Just enjoy biggest blast from rainbow
- HIGHSCORE: Beat your best score by merging as many chips as you can and earn the reward
- POWER UP: To achieve the best results, remember to use power-ups
- ENDLESS CHIPS RANK: Enjoy endless fun!
